remarks: The law of concretion for a binary relation.  See ~ brab2a for alternate proof.  TODO: should one of them be deleted?  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
brab2ga.1 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
brab2ga.2 $e |- R = { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. C /\ y e. D ) /\ ph ) } $.
brab2ga $p |- ( A R B <-> ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) /\ ps ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d ps x y $.
